00012 #include "stxxl/bits/mng/mng.h"

00014 #include "stxxl/bits/algo/async_schedule.h"

00021 
00022 
00023 
00024 // a paranoic check
00025 #define BUF_ISTREAM_CHECK_END
00026 
00027 
00032 template <typename BlkTp_, typename BIDIteratorTp_>
00033 class buf_istream
00034 {
00035     typedef BlkTp_ block_type;
00036     typedef BIDIteratorTp_ bid_iterator_type;
00037 
00038     buf_istream() { }
00039 protected:
00040     typedef block_prefetcher<block_type, bid_iterator_type> prefetcher_type;
00041     prefetcher_type * prefetcher;
00042     bid_iterator_type begin_bid, end_bid;
00043     int_type current_elem;
00044     block_type * current_blk;
00045     int_type * prefetch_seq;
00046 #ifdef BUF_ISTREAM_CHECK_END
00047     bool not_finished;
00048 #endif
00049 public:
00050     typedef typename block_type::reference reference;
00051     typedef buf_istream<block_type, bid_iterator_type> _Self;
00052 
00057     buf_istream(bid_iterator_type _begin, bid_iterator_type _end, int_type nbuffers) :
00058         current_elem(0)
00059 #ifdef BUF_ISTREAM_CHECK_END
00060         , not_finished(true)
00061 #endif
00062     {
00063         //int_type i;
00064         const unsigned_type ndisks = config::get_instance()->disks_number();
00065         const int_type seq_length = _end - _begin;
00066         prefetch_seq = new int_type[seq_length];
00067 
00068         // obvious schedule
00069         //for(int_type i = 0; i< seq_length; ++i)
00070         //      prefetch_seq[i] = i;
00071 
00072         // optimal schedule
00073         nbuffers = STXXL_MAX(2 * ndisks, unsigned_type(nbuffers - 1));
00074         compute_prefetch_schedule(_begin, _end, prefetch_seq,
00075                                   nbuffers, ndisks);
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079         prefetcher = new prefetcher_type(_begin, _end, prefetch_seq, nbuffers);
00080 
00081         current_blk = prefetcher->pull_block();
00082     }
00083 
00088     _Self & operator >> (reference record)
00089     {
00090 #ifdef BUF_ISTREAM_CHECK_END
00091         assert(not_finished);
00092 #endif
00093 
00094         record = current_blk->elem[current_elem++];
00095 
00096         if (current_elem >= block_type::size)
00097         {
00098             current_elem = 0;
00099 #ifdef BUF_ISTREAM_CHECK_END
00100             not_finished = prefetcher->block_consumed(current_blk);
00101 #else
00102             prefetcher->block_consumed(current_blk);
00103 #endif
00104         }
00105 
00106         return (*this);
00107     }
00108 
00111     reference current()     /* const */
00112     {
00113         return current_blk->elem[current_elem];
00114     }
00115 
00118     reference operator *()     /* const */
00119     {
00120         return current_blk->elem[current_elem];
00121     }
00122 
00125     _Self & operator ++()
00126     {
00127 #ifdef BUF_ISTREAM_CHECK_END
00128         assert(not_finished);
00129 #endif
00130 
00131         current_elem++;
00132 
00133         if (current_elem >= block_type::size)
00134         {
00135             current_elem = 0;
00136 #ifdef BUF_ISTREAM_CHECK_END
00137             not_finished = prefetcher->block_consumed(current_blk);
00138 #else
00139             prefetcher->block_consumed(current_blk);
00140 #endif
00141         }
00142         return *this;
00143     }
00144 
00146     virtual ~buf_istream()
00147     {
00148         delete prefetcher;
00149         delete [] prefetch_seq;
00150     }
00151 };
